list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a woman who presents a child at baptism and promises to take responsibility for their religious education.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Miss Weeton was godmother to one of his children
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô Weeton là người mẹ đỡ đầu với một trong những đứa con của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a woman who is influential or pioneering in a movement or organization.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she has been called the godmother of Quebec business
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đã được gọi là ModMother of Quebec kinh doanh
